DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate effect wide range assistance level respiratory pattern , breathe variability include tidal volume peak inspiratory pressure neurally adjust ventilatory assist ( NAVA ) preterm infant . The investigator also aim explore whether effect NAVA electrical activity diaphragm ( Edi ) signal amplitude , work breathe comfort preterm infant .
DOC.brief_title: Respiratory Pattern During Neurally Adjusted Ventilator Assist ( NAVA ) Preterm Infants
DOC.criteria: preterm infant bear 36 week gestational age receive mechanical ventilatory care endotracheal tube least 24 hour respiratory distress use anesthetic analgetics major congenital anomaly ( facial , gastrointestinal tract , cardiac , etc ) phrenic nerve palsy injury
